section1.message: 1.What need to prepare & check before exam?

section1-p1.message: 1.1 if PC is in good condition

section1-p2.message: Check if PC can be open. After it's open, check any damage to keyboard, mouse and earphones.  If any, please info computer lab administrator

section1-p3.message: 1.2 Check if PC software environment can fulfil exam requirement?

section1-p4.message: Open official website http://www.longmanenglish.cn，press the knob on "check study environment" in homepage, to check if the local environment can satisfy exam requirement.

section1-p5.message: After clicking, if all items are in good condition, it means the PC can work normally.  Should there be any item fail after checking,reset the PC according to instruction promptly.

section1-p6.message: 1.3 If can login to U-Learning website

section1-p7.message: Open U-Learning official website http://www.longmanenglish.cn， key in student name and passpword to check if can login to platform. If fails,please register in homepage the name of the school, student name, student number & etc so as to to be convenient to export exam results.

section1-p8.message: 1.4 If to join your teacher class

section1-p9.message: After login to website, check if you have joined your teacher's class, if not, join your teacher's class ASAP.

section1-p11.message: Check if voice can be heard in earphone. Click:

section1-p12.message: in Exam Notice to test audio clip, if no voice, change the earphone immediately.

section1-p14.message: Click and find "start menu--all systems--attachment" which has the mini recording software and use this software to test if recording is normal. (Can find Window XP Recording System in "start menu--all systems--attachment--entertainment)"

section1-p15.message: 1.7 How to do if the recorded voice too low?

section1-p17.message: First to click loud speaker sign on bottom right hand corner, a menu will appear：

section1-p18.message: Click audio clip adjustment nature, a conversation column appears below:

section1-p19.message: A recording volume selection under voice menu, click "volume" know to adjust recording volume.

section1-p20.message: Adjust "microphone" volume to the max, by now the recording  voice will be louder.

section1-p21.message: Right hand button to click loud speaker sign at the right hand bottom, there appears a menu：

section1-p22.message: Click "recording equipment" menu, enter recording adjustment equipment, as shown in the picture below:

section1-p23.message: Click "nature? Knob after selecting microphone, enter recording setup

section1-p24.message: In this dialog box, select degree menu, you can adjust the volume of the microphone to the highest

section1-p26.message: PCs don't have plug-in unit, click "download attachment" knob in Interactive English HOME to download attachment.

section2-p1.message: When student having oral exam, there is a dialog box as shown below

section2-p2.message: Student has to tit "always trust the content of issuer", and then to click working knob,only then student can have normal recording.

section3-p1.message: If student's exam is interrulpted due to equipemnt failure, the student is required to close all broweser windows, restart the Explorer, login U-Learning website, re-enter exam,there will be a page that highlights as shown in the picture:

section3-p2.message: Student to click default answer knob, all answers shall be restored.  To caution,<font class="red">the sytem can only help restore the answers 5 minutes ago. As to oral exam questions, can only play to listen after restoring but not to save again o to upload.</font>

section4-p1.message: When student finishes oral answers, click "save" knob to save recording, therefore, student can save the recording locally and can make copies.

section5-p1.message: When finishing oral exam, click "upload" knob, the oral recording will be successfully uploaded to the Platform.

section6.message: 6 How does one know if the recording has been successfully uploaded?

section6-p1.message: Wait for a few seconds after clicking upload knob, (the longer the recoding, the longer the waiting time),when "successful upload" sign pops up, this shows student's recording has been successfully uploaded.
